text: Radyr Motive Power Depot was a Traction Maintenance Depot located in Radyr, Cardiff, Wales. The depot was situated on the Merthyr Line and was near Radyr station. The depot code is RR. == History == Before its closure in 1965, the depot had an allocation of 0-4-2, 0-6-0, 0-6-2, 2-6-2, 2-8-2 and 4-6-0 steam locomotives. == References == Category: Railway depots in Wales Category:Radyr Category:1884 establishments in Wales Category:1965 disestablishments in Wales
